title: Founder
bio: Marcelo is the founder of iCodeWith.ai. He has 30+ years of experience in the tech industry. He's a Vibe Coder Advocate, passionate about helping non-developers build apps using AI. Prior to launching iCodeWith.ai, Marcelo founded several other startups and held roles at companies like Toyota, NBC, Cigna, J.F. Shea, and Walt Disney Imagineering.
